still a classic almost 20 years later art style is gorgeous and evocative you can see the roots of subsequent games made by platinum and hideki kamiya some sections like the digging minigames havent aged as well but they dont detract from the experience too badly a must play for anyone interested in the history of the action game genre

my absolute top video game ever made i have been playing this game since the ps2 days the timeless art style is a standout in an industry obsessed with high def and shock value this game tells a tale of emotion and struggle while being completely gorgeous the game itself is structured in a way that is a pure joy to play and made so many improvements on that era of games hideki kamiya will always be one of my top video game directors if only because of this game itself
